divs: sighting details in november 1990.it was around 7.30 or so.just got dark.and i was walking to my friends home.he lived around three hundred yards or so from me.as i walked down the road.i heard a motor type sound\i looked up the road to see if something was coming.it sounded like a high speed motorcycle.i seen no head lights.then it hit me.it sounded not coming down the road;but flying.i looked up and seen a solid red object.the best way to say the looks. it looked kind like a up side down fish bowl.it had a dome top.the object had lights arond the sided.the dome was lite.as was the bottom.i watched as it cleared the hill top ahead of me.
trends: There has been one other sighting in dwarf
There were no other sightings in dwarf on or around November 12th 1990
Summary: i heard a starge sound,and looked up to see a red obeject over the tree tops and watched till it cleared another hill top
